Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Literary papyrus
Description: Literary papyrus whose proposed restorations evokes a historical or rhetoric text concerning Kallisthenes (line 1), Demetrius of Phalene (line 2) and Alexander, suggestive of a work on the (famous) eloquence of the two first, which was of no use to them could not prevent their final failure.
